Description.SourceString: Launch mining expeditions to find the resources used by the Crystal Forge to upgrade your gear. Each expedition costs gold; the more lucrative the mine, the higher the expedition cost. Not all expeditions will be equally successful, as sometimes your team will locate extra paths that take them deeper into a mine where they can find both more, and rarer, ores.
